20110101092935.000|20110101092937.000|CC1|    OR AFTER STOPPING CHANTIX.  
20110101092937.000|20110101092937.000|CC1|       IF YOU NOTICE ANY OF     
20110101092937.000|20110101092939.000|CC1|   THESE SYMPTOMS OR BEHAVIORS, 
20110101092939.000|20110101092939.000|CC1|   STOP TAKING CHANTIX AND CALL 
20110101092939.000|20110101092941.000|CC1|     YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY.

20110101092943.000|20110101092943.000|CC1|             OR OTHER
